Thank you Regards

z900

forumNotes.author: AeroXP
forumNotes.content:
> Win2000 when I started the installation, but freezes  
> when it needs to show the Eula file.

TXTsetup.sif does not have the Eula.txt line, I think. (Setup SMSS needs txtsetup to find anything.)
